Tag.description: A key-value pair to associated with the Kinesis Video Stream.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. Specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. Specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. The following characters can be used: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: DataRetentionInHours
properties.description: The number of hours till which Kinesis Video will retain the data in the stream

type.description: The number of hours till which Kinesis Video will retain the data in the stream

properties.name: DeviceName
properties.description: The name of the device that is writing to the stream.

type.description: The name of the device that is writing to the stream.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: AWS KMS key ID that Kinesis Video Streams uses to encrypt stream data.

type.description: AWS KMS key ID that Kinesis Video Streams uses to encrypt stream data.

properties.name: MediaType
properties.description: The media type of the stream. Consumers of the stream can use this information when processing the stream.

type.description: The media type of the stream. Consumers of the stream can use this information when processing the stream.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the Kinesis Video stream.

type.description: The name of the Kinesis Video stream.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs associated with the Kinesis Video Stream.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs associated with the Kinesis Video Stream.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video stream.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Kinesis Video stream.
